entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning then west 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
